website_summaries.verdict: A large set of dumbbells and a sturdy rack to complete your home gym.
pros: Once assembled, this dumbbell set has everything you need, including a 40" rack
Iron weights are of good quality and have rubber coatings
cons: These weights may come with a bit of oil on them and a strong odor, but both dissipate over time

customer_reviews.title: Better than adjustable weights!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of weights! I was finding that with my adjustable dumbbells that the pace of some workouts would slow down while trying to fumble to get the right amount dialed in. These weights totally eliminated the problem. As others have mentioned they come with a light film of oil but it seems to be disappearing as time goes on. Just be sure to wipe them down as they will leave black stains until they've dried out.
customer_reviews.author: TJF

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the correct rack for the dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells are fine. However, the company swapped out the rack shown in the picture with another one that is not made for the type of dumbbells purchased. The railings on the rack are too high for the dumbbells so any dumbbell under 30# rests on the handles and will roll in the rack. I did not realize this would be a problem until rack was entirely assembled. Also, the rack sent is made for a more dumbbells than the set purchased so there are excessive spaces on the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Brady

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about 2.5 years now and I have used them 3-5 times every week since I purchased them. They have held up very well with all the abuse I have put them through. The grip feels natural and comfortable. The rubber mat is pretty thin (it won't project against dropping weights) but it is still a nice to have. I have no regrets with this purchase and would highly recommend this to anyone putting together a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: and weights are of good quality. The weights do have a smell to ...
customer_reviews.text: The weight rack, mat, and weights are of good quality. The weights do have a smell to them that dissipates over time. I've had mine for about a year, and I don't notice a smell anymore (maybe I just got used to it). I paid more for this than I was originally thinking I would, but these are better than I thought they'd be.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Good db set.
customer_reviews.text: Came crated in a plywood box. I love these weights. Assembly of the rack was super easy and it seems sturdy. The weights are high quality and have held up so far with drops from the bench. I might be hard of smelling but I didn't notice the smell everyone else is talking about. However, I have them in my barn with high ceilings and well ventilated. No problems and these are good quality DB's. There is also some touch up paint that I didnt' open but I assume is for the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was very nice. Came on a pallet
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very nice. Came on a pallet, very nicely organized. They loaded the pallet right into my garage. The dumbbells are awesome, great quality and better than most gyms. The rack is very sturdy and the mat is a nice touch. Would like to get a 50-100 lbs rack now.
customer_reviews.author: 12TANG

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! The "grease" came off after some a few uses. Never needed a rag to wipe them off. They have a nice rubber coating on them so they don't beat up my walls/floor if knicked or dropped. Stand is heavy and sturdy. As for the smell..... If you've ever been in a gym before theres nothing odd barely notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice dumbbells, premium feel, comfortable to hold. The price seems high at first but once you figure in free shipping and the included rack it is competitive. Only complaint is they give off a horrible odor (rubber solvents, I'd guess). After two weeks in the basement with fans running I moved them outside to air out. I still give these a high rating because I know the odor is temporary.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Thelen

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is a great deal on the weights. Try to find this quality cheaper anywhere. Yes they have a rubber smell but they are made with rubber. Mine are in the garage so I dont even notice the smell. Weights are fantastic and exactly as described. Excellent communication with seller and items were shipped very fast. Delivery was a breeze and the delivery driver was fantastic. I gave only 4 stars because I had to accept a different rack than one in the picture and it kinda sucks. There isnt much room on the bottom to pick up the larger weights without banging your wrists. Other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Childs

customer_reviews.title: Overall great weight set
customer_reviews.text: Love this weight set! Only issue is that black coloring comes off of the weights and onto my clothing and on the concrete flooring during my rest period. So far the coloring has washed out of my clothes...
customer_reviews.author: CAK1124

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dumbbells!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Dumbbells! Didn't need the mat because I have rubber flooring. They look and feel great! I use them in my personal training studio for myself and my clients!
customer_reviews.author: Steve21

customer_reviews.title: Great for home gym.
customer_reviews.text: The weights feel good and the rack is easy to put together. It's expensive but once you buy it you will be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This went in our company weight room, its a 15-40 room so I dont know if the room size killed the "rubber" smell all the others are complaining about but this set is great. Sturdy stand, great feeling weights in the hands. I would but a second set for the house if I wasnt at work 14 hours a day!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Likes and Dislikes
customer_reviews.text: Likes: -dumbbells came in neatly packaged -rack and mat was mistakenly not shipped (this is in the likes because the body solid customer service was so good and quick to response I just could not Dislike this product) Dislikes: -rack was difficult to assemble (probably cause I was doing it alone)
customer_reviews.author: Gianne Obrero

customer_reviews.title: Rack is easy to assemble and built solid
customer_reviews.text: Rack is easy to assemble and built solid. I racked all weights with the heavies dumbbells on the center rack and there's no indication it will tip over. The rubbers on dumbbells seem to be made for heavy duty use. Weight #s listed on both sides of dumbbells make it easy to identify them.
customer_reviews.author: chris chang

customer_reviews.title: Good value per lb
customer_reviews.text: Solid build. Expect your entire room to smell for a couple of weeks. Wish the rubber coating was thicker but happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great Vaule: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Started working out at home and this set is great for our home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: ... this set to my husband for Christmas & it's great! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this set to my husband for Christmas & it's great! Sturdy, well-built, professional quality weights & rack. The mat was backordered & showed up over a month late, & it's nothing more than a stationary bike mat that doesn't seem to fit the rack well...but that's the only complaint we have with this set. I'd order it again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-made stuff
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but sturdy and well-made stuff. The rack is sturdy and easy to assemble with a single 11mm socket or crescent wrench. The dumbells are the same quality as you find in the gym. The rubber mat that goes under the rack, though, is a bit flimsy. The deliverers roughed up the box it came in and there was a big gouge taken out of the rubber. All in all, a good purchase, pricey but high quality and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: la-brisa-del-mar

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape individually boxed and palleted. Great dumbbells for the price especially when it comes with the rack. I am totally satisfied. I wiped down each dumbbell with a cloth and small amount of dish detergent. Rubber smell that some complain about was not that strong and it goes away after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Nik C.

customer_reviews.title: There's already a ton of good reviews for this product but here's another
customer_reviews.text: There's already a ton of good reviews for this product but here's another. They feel great in the hand, great quality, the rack is sturdy and the mat is really thick. And the smell isn't nearly as bad as some of the reviews have said. Just wash the oily stuff off and you're good to go
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Kram

customer_reviews.title: Great dumbbell set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dumbbell set! It ships via freight so don't expect 2 day prime delivery. It does have a rubber odor and the rubber has a greasy coating. I washed each one individually with dish soap and water, which helped a lot, but there was still a little bit of black residue that may come off on you or your clothes. The odor dissipated after a couple of days. Aside from that, I love this set. It will definitely last a lifetime as long as you take care of it. If you go into this knowing the downfalls with the greasy coating and the odor, which both dissipate, you'll be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cebob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality dumbbells with rack
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to assemble, but the instructions were vague and very lacking. It took a while for it to arrive by freight and not a lot of communication from seller other than they gave the number of the freight company that was shipping my order. Be ready to unload the dumbbells from off the truck, so you'll need a few men to come help unload the truck, but they do give you a curtsey call about 40-60 minutes prior to their arriving, which you can request that when you schedule the delivery with them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Dumbbells and rack were definitely better made than I expected. The rack was heavy and held the weights perfectly. The dumbbells had light rubbery smell but it did not last long. Dumbbells seem well made and rubber covering vs metal one is nicer at home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Suomi

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Gym-quality dumbbells, complete with a thick mat and sturdy rack. Rubber smell dissipates in a matter of days and wiping oil off weights before they're used will help eliminate the odor. This set should last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stack

customer_reviews.title: 5-50 POUND DUMBELL SET
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME DEAL ON THE RUBBER DUMBELLS 5-50 POUND SET WITH THE RACK AND MAT COULD NOT HAVE PASSED IT UP. DUMBELLS WILL LAST FOR YEARS TO COME! NOW I NEED AMAZON TO GIVE ME A GOOD DEAL WITH THE 55-100 POUND RUBBER DUMBELL SET!
customer_reviews.author: roderick dubose

customer_reviews.title: Top self product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! Rack was easy to assemble and everything was packaged perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality set for my home gym! It neatly keeps weights in order...LOVE THIS DUMBBELL RACK AND WEIGHTS!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Great product and was packaged to where everything came in mint condition. I highly recommend these dumdells.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gano

customer_reviews.title: Great Dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I bought this entire set of dumbbells and rack and they have been awesome. What I recommend is that when you get them, immediately take them out of the boxes and let them air out. After a few days, use a vinegar/baking soda solution with water and clean them. When they are dry, let them bake in the sun (if you can do this) for a few days, or put a heating lamp on them (if that works) because the curing from that direct heat will get rid of that rubber smell. Other than that, they are awesome and work great!
customer_reviews.author: KeyZar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this set. The grips are very comfortable and the rubber coating makes it so they don't clank when you put them back on the rack. These are better than the ones at the gym I used to go to. They do make your house smell like a tire store, but I don't mind. I've always liked the smell of fresh rubber and I'm sure the smell will fade away after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Blake

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality dumbbells and rack.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the rack and dumbbells. The rack had one shelf that the holes did not match up but I was able to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction, perfect for a home gym. The quality is about what you would find in a a hotel/resort gym.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: Dumbell set and stand was exactly as described. Great quality. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Everything is as described
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Everything is as described. Other reviews were right about the rubbery smell, but it does not bother me as it's in my gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Needs wiped down but overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zerebniak

customer_reviews.title: very good product and price
customer_reviews.text: The whole set essentially cost about 1K which I think is a good price for what you get. The mat came in handy and I actually use it to work out on rather than putting it under the rack. The mat was damaged during shipping and I hadno hassle for replacement which was shipped rather quickly (they only required a photo of the damaged mat before shipping a new one). The weights (since they are rubber) do have a strong rubber odor to it when you unpack but it will go away after several days/weeks. I set up the weights in my garage which didn't bother me. definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: shezam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, they're durable and great for a lot of different exercise
customer_reviews.author: JONATHAN MARION WAYMAN

customer_reviews.title: The rack serves its purpose but recommend purchasing a slanted rack that gives better access to ...
customer_reviews.text: The rack serves its purpose but recommend purchasing a slanted rack that gives better access to weights. No issues with the weights - smell like rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend anyone looking to pay fealty to the swole gods
customer_reviews.text: I just completed my first workout, with these masterfully crafted tools of muscle-building goodness and i'm in complete awe. You can tell the designers of this product poured their heart and soul in forging these weights, fit for the thunder god Thor himself. I highly recommend anyone looking to pay fealty to the swole gods, to purchase this dumbbell set: you will not be disappointed. Update 8/28/15 I noticed one 40 dumbbell has developed a scratch on the side. I put tape on to prevent further disfigurement--alas I'am dissapointed on the shoddy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: terrible odor
customer_reviews.text: The set itself is excellent./ The problem is the horrible odor that permiates from the rubber. I dont know what to do to get rid of it. They are alsoi coated with an oil, so be very carerful where you place the dumbels. Well made and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: bob shelley

product_meta.title: Body-Solid Rubber Hex Dumbbell Set with 3-Tier Horizontal Rack (GDR363-RFWS)
product_meta.description:
The Body-Solid Rubber Hex Dumbbell Set with 3-Tier Horizontal Rack (GDR363-RFWS) includes everything you need to train with free weights in a home or professional gym. This weight stand holds the included set of 5- to 50-pound hex dumbbells (SDRS550), offering a simple storage solution for your free weight collection. The dumbbell stand is made with heavy-gauge steel for use in your commercial or home gym. The tubing is welded on all four sides and the metal is de-burred inside and out for user safety. The sturdy, space-efficient design is safe to be placed against a wall or freestanding in the center of a weight room. Weighing between 5 and 50 pounds, the included set of ten pairs of hex dumbbells features a durable rubber coating that helps prevents damage to floors and equipment, with a beveled steel grip with light knurled finish for a steady hold while you lift. An equipment mat (RF34B) made of durable PVC material is also included to go underneath the weight stand to help protect the floor. The Body-Solid 3-Tier Horizontal Dumbbell Rack set measures 40 by 20 by 30 inches (L x W x H) with a 38-inch tray availability and a weight of 44 pounds. The equipment mat measures 36 by 48 by 1/8 inch. The entire dumbbell rack set is backed by the Body-Solid Lifetime In-Home , which fully covers all parts for as long as you own it.

AMAZON.COM
This package from Body-Solid includes everything you need to get started training with free weights, including a dumbbell rack, complete set of dumbbells, and a rubber mat to place it all on. 

GDR363 Three-tier Horizontal Dumbbell Rack
This convenient weight rack features three shelves which hold a full set of dumbbells, helping keep your workout area organized and most importantly safe. An open design means you can place the durable, stable rack against a wall or centered in a room. Heavy gauge steel construction includes tubing that's been welded on all four sides, and de-burred inside and out for maximum user safety.

The rack measures 40-by-30-by-20 inches (W x H x D) when fully assembled.

SDRS550 Five-to-50-pound Set of Rubber Dumbbells
A patent-pending Secure Dumbbell System combines one-piece cast iron heads with steel inserts that have been pinned, press-fitted, and welded. The weights' compact design makes them shorter in length and easier to work with than conventional dumbbells, while a durable rubber finish protects both you and your workout area.

The set includes two each of 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, and 50-pound hexagonal dumbbells.

RF34B Rubber Equipment Mat
Ideal for general fitness use, this mat is made of super-tough, durable PVC material that protects your floors and carpets from the damaging effects of heavy exercise equipment. The mat dampens vibrations that cause wear and tear, and muffles noises so family and neighbors are not disturbed during even your most intense workouts.

The mat measures 48-by-36 inches (W x D), and is 0.125 inches thick.

Lifetime Warranty
Body-Solid gym equipment includes a limited lifetime manufacturer's warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.

About Body-Solid
Body-Solid, Inc. is a leading manufacturer and distributor of high quality fitness equipment for the home and commercial markets. With over 20 years of experience, Body-Solid offers one of the widest arrays of products in the industry, including multi-station gyms, free weight machines, a complete line of cardiovascular products, weight plates, kettle bells, dumbbells, and fitness accessories.
feature_bullets: DURABILITY: This durable dumbbell rack includes 10 sets of 5 - 50-pound rubber-coated hex dumbbells, and an equipment mat
EFFICIENT: Sturdy and space-efficient weight rack keeps fitness rooms organized and safe
DIMENSIONS: This rack with dumbbell set measures 40 x 20 x 30 ( L x W x H), and weighs 44 pounds

CONSTRUCTION: Rack has a heavy-gauge steel construction with tubing welded on all 4 sides. Dumbbells have a solid cast iron encased in rubber, medium gauge knurling for a solid grip, and a hexagon shape to prevent rolling
SOLID: Body-Solid is committed to providing you quality weight lifting and fitness gear
